roleset.name: flatten fabric using a mangle
roleset.note: MANGLE-V NOTES: roleset by Julia based on internet search, wordnet. Member of Vncls carve-21.2-2. Similar to 'flatten.01' (from mangle.01-v)

roles.note: Mangling consists of pressing fabric between two hot rollers in order to make it flat. (from mangle.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The workers mangled the sheets until they were dry and crease-free.
example.arg: until they were dry and crease-free.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: *PRO* Fold these evenly while damp, and *PRO* mangle.

example.name: transitive
example.text: George W. Bush mangled the English language like no other president.

example.name: passive
example.text: An 81-year-old Athol widow was killed in Lancaster yesterday when [her compact sedan]-2 was mangled *trace*-2 by a freight train locomotive at a busy and hazardous Boston and Maine rail intersection with Route 117.
